A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Truly fantastic film. It's unexpected and there's a lot to process\, but I'm hopeful many of the disappointed fans will come around on this one with time and some rewatches. Did Rian make a movie that's too emotionally complex for Star Wars fans?! I'm glad he went where he did and I really hope this backlash doesn't prevent him from setting up another trilogy\, because I think he can do even better with a blank slate than he did having to pick up JJs threads (and I loved TFA). Thank you\, Rian!
